original_title: 10 Centavos para o Número da Besta
overview: Paulo Cesar Pereio is an unique figure in the history of Brazilian cinema. Winner of a number of awards and with a career that spans from legendary Cinema Novo features to erotic comedies and many other kinds of projects, Pereio remembers the roles of his life in a number of interviews.
title: 10 Centavos para o Número da Besta
